modName: Legend of Zelda Return of A Hero under new management
summary: With only me and one other person still working on this mod, it could die without any additional help, so if you can contribute, no matter how small, it would help a whole lot.
descriptionHtml:
I have taken over this mod now, along with PayneXIII (and be sure to check out the beta of his own Zelda mod here http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/42624/? I highly recommend it). Without a bigger team though, it could die. I don't want that to happen, and I'm sure many of you would like to see this completed, so please, if you can contribute, no matter how small, it would mean a ton. For the Master Sword and Hylian Shield in the screenshots, go to my other mod here (http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/49511/) Be sure to download both files in the downloads section, and remember to report any bugs in the comment section, or you can PM me as well.
Make sure you make a copy of '"The Zelda Projekt.bsa" and rename it to "Hylian.bsa" DO NOT RENAME ORIGINAL .BSA MAKE SURE YOU RENAME THE COPY. I'm not sure why it's like that, if someone knows how to fix this please let me know I can do so. That's all I have to say, below is the original description.

This mod aims to rebuild the World from The Legend of Zelda Ocarina of Time. The story is undecided as of now, as we go along it will be planned out.


Locations:
Kakariko: 90%
Lost Woods: 75%
Lon Lon Ranch: 10%
Hyrule Field: 40%
Hyrule City: 10%
everything else: 0%



Just extract the file with WinRAR or 7Zip, place the extracted concent into your Skyrim directory.
Activate the .esps and .esms in the Skyrim Launcher.


Q: How can I get into Hyrule
A: Open the console in Skyrim type help Kakariko, and choose on of the cells that appear on the menu.
Q: I have floating grass
A: Follow the steps from this website: http://www.creationkit.com/Floating_Grass_Fix


This project canÂ´t survive without your help, we really need more Modders for our Team. We search for anyone who wants to help in any way at all.


To the ZREO Team, that allowed us to use there amazing Music
Visit there awesome Work on there Homepage:
http://www.zreomusic.com/


Big thanks to all of these people:

http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/40615

author: MaGlas jewfish PayneXIII
